com.facebook.buck.distributed.build_slave

Class CacheOptimizedBuildTargetsQueueFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.distributed.build_slave.CacheOptimizedBuildTargetsQueueFactory

  • public class CacheOptimizedBuildTargetsQueueFactory
extends Object
    Helper class for creating a BuildTargetsQueue optimized by using the remote and local artifact caches, and to upload critical, missing artifacts from the local cache to the remote cache.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CacheOptimizedBuildTargetsQueueFactory(BuildRuleResolver resolver, ArtifactCacheByBuildRule artifactCache, boolean isDeepRemoteBuild, RuleDepsCache ruleDepsCache, boolean shouldBuildSelectedTargetsLocally) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Create BuildTargetsQueue with the given parameters.
      com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<?> uploadCriticalNodesFromLocalCache(Iterable<BuildTarget> targetsToBuild, ClientStatsTracker clientStatsTracker)
      Upload the smallest set of cachable BuildRules from the dir-cache, which can help the remote servers in finishing the build faster.

    • Method Detail

      • uploadCriticalNodesFromLocalCache

        public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<?> uploadCriticalNodesFromLocalCache(Iterable<BuildTarget> targetsToBuild,
                                                                                               ClientStatsTracker clientStatsTracker)
        Upload the smallest set of cachable BuildRules from the dir-cache, which can help the remote servers in finishing the build faster.
        Parameters:
        targetsToBuild - Top-level targets which this build needs to optimize for.
        clientStatsTracker - For tracking some timing/perf metrics for the Stampede client.
        Returns:
        Future to track the progress of the uploads.

      • createBuildTargetsQueue

        public ReverseDepBuildTargetsQueue createBuildTargetsQueue(Iterable<BuildTarget> targetsToBuild,
                                                           CoordinatorBuildRuleEventsPublisher coordinatorBuildRuleEventsPublisher,
                                                           int mostBuildRulesFinishedPercentageThreshold)
        Create BuildTargetsQueue with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        targetsToBuild - top-level targets that need to be built.
        Returns:
        an instance of BuildTargetsQueue with the top-level targets at the root.
